title: What buffing Fizz E's cooldown sounds like
body: Fizz fares pretty well against mages when his cooldowns are up, so we're giving him the tools to engage more often.

replies.body: I want this sentence to become a meme for every single time that Riot will do a stupid change in the future.
"Yasuo fares pretty well against ranged champs when his wind wall is up, so we're lowering the cooldown early."

"Darius fares pretty well against melee champions, so we are reducing the cool down on his apprehend so that he can engage more often"

The cooldown is the same at rank 5 as it would be now. It's the first ability he maxes.

Such a none issue. Why is there even a circlejerk over it?
I'm sure you don't know the feeling when the assassin you're suppose to bully early has CD on his defensive/engage ability lower than your own.
Assassins are supposed to bully you. That is kinda THEIR job.
There's a difference between bullying and having no defensive options because he exists.
{{item:3070}} {{champion:4}} {{item:3070}}

Assassins beat people 1v1. That is their job. 

If they're not assassinating people, it's probably because they're not assassins or underpowered.

That is not their job. If an assassin could 1v1 a juggernaut something is/hasgone wrong. And even if that was there job then it still would not be oke for them all to be able to 1v1 the entire game. Some assassins are lanebullies while  with others you have to survive early so you can destroy everything lategame ({{champion:84}} {{champion:38}} ) Fizz is in the later catagory however much less than the 2 examples. Guessing from your name i think you play karthus so you maybe know the importance of the lvl 1 in that matchup vs fizz  where you basicly set him behind on his weak lvl 1 enough so you can keep him low and pushed in until the first back where you get enough mr to survive his all in or he will get 6 on even footing and kill you whenever his ult is up without you being able to do much.

Karthus is something I would never play into Fizz, or any mid lane assassin for that matter. I understand that playing a mage with virtually no hard CC, against a hypermobile assassin, is a terrible idea. In the event that I was somehow forced and nobody would trade, I would play very passive, farm under turret post-6 and abuse my global threat potential.

An assassins job is to assassinate lone targets, with the odd exception like Garen, Cho and Darius, whom nobody with any sense will attempt to do. You are alone in lane, and you are no exception.

Akali does that through sustain and stickiness, because she lacks the raw burst to 100-0 most things like Zed, for example, can.

>Assassins beat people 1v1. That is their job. 

Unless they are doing that whole game, then it's not called an "assassin", but a "balance problem".
*cough* look at the board *cough*

Uhh, but wouldn't it be easier for Fizz to engage on an ADC or squishy in the backline of a teamfight, like lets say he Q, R, E and bursted him/her, {{item:3157}}, and E out while Fizz's frontline helps prevent other frontliners from CCing him? Fizz's cooldowns on E at max level is 10 seconds, but will reach 6 seconds with 40% cdr and 5.5 at 45% cdr. {{item:3157}} takes out 2.5 seconds with stasis, which will give him 3 seconds of no E. Depending on how much you wanna buff Fizz's E, this would be a good idea that will balance Fizz a bit more, or make him prone to some nerfs. My idea is at max rank, his E is reduced by 1 or 1.5 seconds, or just make his scaling worse, but keep his max rank of E the same by reducing 1-2 seconds in earlier ranks, like 1-2.

The buff is only to his early E CD, and his E is by far his most expensive skill mana wise as well, it isn't like it is breaking him, it's just allowing him to use it faintly more frequently, and be OoM earlier because of it.
hahaha "mana", like that's a finite resource in League or something.

For Fizz?  Yes.  His E is obscenely expensive, at 90-110 mana.  

With his base 300-ish mana, thats 3 Es and he's OoM early game pretty much.



The reason people call mana a joke is for mages, they can just rush Lost Chapter for 300 mana+20% max mana per level up, but Fizz can't do that.   He needs his Lichbane ASAP or he won't stand a chance fighting another champion, and for fighters, the reason its a joke is because they tend to have their primary waveclear/fighting skill be stupidly cheap at like 30-40 mana, if it cost mana at all.

Fizz doesn't have the luxury a lot of other melee fighters/assassin like him do, in the fact that he doesn't have safe cheap waveclear.  His W is cheap, sure, but requires him to auto the target twice, which means it isn't safe.  His E is fast, but puts his primary escape on CD and cost a ton of his mana pool even with the fact he rushes Lichbane, at 1/6th to 1/7th of his early-mid game mana pool.


Sure, lategame his mana pool is sustainable generally between Lichbane and the fact that he will probably get blues after the second blue, but that isn't till post 13 minutes.


A 2 second CD buff on E (That's impact scales further down with rank, by level 5 it's only a 1 second drop and at 9 it's back to live values), Fizz in no way will be broken by this buff.

Waiting for an ADC attack speed get buffed then there should be a line like that along: "X-Marksman fares pretty well against anything except Rammus when his autoattacks are up, so we're giving him the tools to autoattack more often."

The buff on the PBE has his E CD down by just 2 seconds at rank 1 and at the exact same as it is now at rank 5. It's really kinda ridiculous that people are making such a big deal about this.

yeah i know that but what i mean isnt omagad fizz will be op noob cancer champ Q_Q . I mean that you wanna kill him and puit him far behind before level 6 and play around his E cd so reducing it is stupid from riot it reduces the counterplay , it lets fizz player do more mistakes and still not get punished  . to buff a champ you need to up his strenghts , not to reduce his counterplay .

because... you know...... the time when you can bully fizz.... its pre 6
after that, it becomes quite difficult to do so (he actually gets kill pressure at lv 3, compare this with akali that people complain a lot about which gets kill pressure at lv6, but fizz gets it at 3 and gets bigger at lv 6)

so, its similar buff to what akali got. The people that know how to play fizz/akali will have an easier laning phase with those champions.
it won't matter to much in late game (which is their second weakness), or even in mid game (when they are at their best).
But they will reach that mid game in a more easy way with this buff. So, its not MASSIVE OMG BROKEN
Tho, its still a buff.
Like, giving adcs +10mr and armor in the early game, but scaling to the current values at lv 10+.

Which would make them similar to right now in mid and late. But a bit harder to dive or kill in the early game via BOT LANE PARTY.
Which, as nice as it might sound (to avoid that), it would also make jungle ganks from the jungler on bot lane more difficult and allow adcs to scale easier into mid and late game. Which you probably wouldn't be a fan off.
So, while its good that's not happening with them. It is happening to fizz and akali and ekko and probably riot will buff some other assassin this way as well. Making their early game a bit more 'easy to survive'
